title: The first task is to win the war (Spanish poster, 1936)
Text:: The first task is to win the war.Year  1936.Publisher  Madrid Defence Council.Artist  Kantos.Additional information  Spanish poster from the Spanish Civil War showing five hands holding up their bayonets against Republican flags. Clockwise from top left, the flags appear to be those of the anarchist CNT-FAI, the Communists, the Unified Socialist Youth (or possibly generic socialist) and the Spanish Republic. The poster was one of many issued by the Madrid Defence Council urging unity among the Republicanâ€™s various factions during the war.
